channel.title: CVE Feed for ESET, spol. s r.o. -- ESET Endpoint Encryption
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ESET, spol. s r.o. -- ESET Endpoint Encryption

item.title: CVE-2022-2402|2024-08-03T00:39:07.488Z -- eset%2C%20spol.%20s%20r.o. -- eset%20endpoint%20encryption
item.description: The vulnerability in the driver dlpfde.sys enables a user logged into the system to perform system calls leading to kernel stack overflow, resulting in a system crash, for instance, a BSOD.
